org.grails.plugin.vaadin.ui
[Groovy] Class DefaultCreate

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponent
      com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponentContainer
          com.vaadin.ui.AbstractLayout
              com.vaadin.ui.CustomLayout
                  org.grails.plugin.vaadin.ui.DefaultCreate

class DefaultCreate
extends com.vaadin.ui.CustomLayout

Mimics the Grails scaffolding create.gsp

Note that the layout can be customised by modifying the HTML in VAADIN/themes/{theme}/layouts/create.html

You can also specify a different HTML layout to use, in the constructor

Authors:
Francis McKenzie

Property Detail

entityName

java.lang.String entityName

instance

java.lang.Object instance

 
Constructor Detail

DefaultCreate

DefaultCreate(java.lang.String entityName, java.lang.Object instance)
Create the layout using the default 'create.html' page in web-app/VAADIN/themes/{theme}/layouts
Parameters:
entityName - The entity name to use for labels (e.g. "Book")
instance - The instance of the domain class - e.g. used to get id for links

DefaultCreate

DefaultCreate(java.lang.String entityName, java.lang.Object instance, java.lang.String layoutName)
Create the layout using the specified layout HTML page in web-app/VAADIN/themes/{theme}/layouts
Parameters:
entityName - The entity name to use for labels (e.g. "Book")
instance - The instance of the domain class - e.g. used to get id for links
layoutName - The name of the HTML page to use for the layout
